name: CQ_Analytics.ClickstreamcloudUI
doc:
The CQ_Analytics.ClickstreamcloudUI object is a singleton providing utility methods to
display th...

props.name: MODE_LINK
props.doc: <static> Link display mode: property value is displayed as a link.

props.name: MODE_STATIC
props.doc: <static> Static display mode: only property value is displayed as a simple text.

props.name: MODE_TEXTFIELD
props.doc: <static> Textfield display mode: property value is displayed with pattern: property = value.

props.name: VERSION_FULL
props.doc: <static> Full version display mode: displays a complete UI, session store properties/values...

props.name: VERSION_LIGHT
props.doc: <static> Light version display mode: displays a light UI, only session store values are shown.

methods.name: addLineBreak
methods.doc: Adds a line break to the section.

methods.name: init
methods.doc: Initializes the clickstreamcloud UI with the given config.

methods.name: register
methods.doc: Registers a session store. Properties of the store will be displayed in a dedicated section.

methods.name: reset
methods.doc: Resets the section, i.e. rebuilds section based on the current session store state.
